siteMetadata.name: Imam Hossain
siteMetadata.title: Imam Hossain | Software Engineer
siteMetadata.description: Associate Software Engineer | Android, Kotlin, Java, Flutter
siteMetadata.about: A passionate programmer and results-oriented app developer with more than two year of experience in both development and research positions. I am self-driven and hungry to learn new technologies and strategies from this rapidly changing industry. My main focus is to maintain proper guidelines and architecture while developing apps. Strong eye for detail and tenacity to never quit on something until it is absolutely perfect.
siteMetadata.author: @ihjohny

projects.name: Foreksty
projects.description: Simple and nice looking android apps that provide a weather forecast from darksky API with offline data caching feature. It is developed by using kotlin and android architecture components like LiveData, ViewModel, Room, Navigation. Following MVVM (Model View ViewModel) architecture.

projects.name: TrackYourself
projects.description: A native android application developed by using java for tracking one's daily activities, managing daily tasks, taking a journal,notes, set reminder, get notifications, etc. Also provide user task completion statistics in bar chart, pie chart and line chart by using MPAndroidChart Library
